txt.en: You discovered this gland as the Gurvand was slain. Perhaps Veúlfur at the Twenty-first Hall would be interested in this find.

'This appears to be the same infection that spreads through the Orcs, but not the source. It appears that this creature was also infected.

'Was there nothing beyond this creature in that place? No?

'I think, [placeholder], that the secrets of the deep dark of Khazad-dûm are not all yet learned. But for now, we know that a great evil is vanquished and that we have you to thank for these efforts.'
As the Gurvand fell, you saw a swollen sore covered in what appeared to be fungus ooze to the surface of its flesh.
Bring the gland to Veúlfur at the Twenty-first Hall
Veúlfur is at the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nAfter discovering a diseased gland on the Gurvand, you plucked the item clear and must now deliver it to someone who might better understand its meaning.
